name: The Sea Mechanics
description:
The Sea Mechanics is a game made during the 48 hour Global Game Jam.

The theme of the jam was Repair.

In The Sea Mechanics you have to collect items from the ocean to repair your ship, and add coal to keep the ship going. And eventually reach the end-location.

The game has been made by:

Hugo dijkstra
Cas wijers
Jack Hulspas
Joaquim Obispo
Zuhra Fuad
